revised_title: Aerodynamic Interference in Elliptic Wind Tunnels
tldr: The authors investigate the lift and drag experienced by an aerofoil in a wind tunnel with an elliptic section, comparing it to free air conditions. They analyze the effects of the tunnel walls on the aerofoil's performance and provide methods to minimize errors. The study focuses on the interference experienced by an aerofoil in an elliptic tunnel, with the goal of improving wind tunnel design and aerodynamic testing.
